title: Israelgogo
author: Israelgogo
content: HIV is a disease One need to be careful of ,it is widely adviced to have a personal clippers and protect yourself during sex by using condoms.Ways at which HIV can be transmitted are through blood transfusion ,semen ,vaginal fluid, breast milk and rectal fluid e.g anus.Having HIV can managed not to get to AIDS using your suppressor drugs ARV'S known to be anti retro viral drugs which suppresses the virus and strengthen your immunes ,also eating the right fruits and vitamins .HIV becomes AIDS within the period of 2 to 10 years if a patient's refuses to use his drugs and the side effect of not using your drugs ,it will lead to TB known to be tuberculosis.An HIV patient can live a healthy life ,get married to an HIV free person and give birth to an HIV free child,while the partner and child becomes HIV free, this can be managed by a Doctor. An HIV patient can live for a longer time if they adhere to the usage of drugs and maintain a healthy lifestyle and keep going. Take this diseases serious and prevent yourself•Human immune virus•Acquired immuno deficiency syndrome .
